org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.query.filter.expression

Class BooleanFieldValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.query.filter.expression.FieldValue<Object>
      • org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.query.filter.expression.BooleanFieldValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistable, BooleanExpression, Expression<Object>, Filter, GenericExpression, Predicate

    public class BooleanFieldValue
extends FieldValue<Object>
implements BooleanExpression
    A field value implementation for interpreting any adapter field as a boolean. Non-boolean field values will evaluate to true if they are non-null.
